roleset.name: to argue

roles.note: Differs from verb entry bicker.01 because this roleset conflated the two bickerers.

roleset.note: Roleset based on BOLT P01. Comparison to verb entry bicker.01, which maps to 36.4-1. FrameNet Quarreling.

example.name: All args
example.text: I honestly don't understand how any man could choose to get involved in his wife's bickering with her girlfriend over shoes and a dog.
